content: this is a summary of a legal case in estonia that lasted for 3 years and 9 months the harju county court made a final decision on november 16 2020 the case revolves around a civil dispute between two parties identified as v and n regarding the division of joint property the plaintiff v filed a lawsuit seeking a division of the joint property and certain declarations the defendant n filed a counterclaim seeking a division of the joint property and a monetary compensation of 3500 euros the court ruled that the joint property should be divided with certain properties awarded to each party the court also ordered the removal of mortgages and prohibition notices from the properties certain movable property and money were left in the possession of each party the court declared the enforcement case inadmissible and canceled certain measures related to the enforcement proceedings each party is responsible for their own procedural costs the text provides a detailed account of the legal arguments and justifications for the courts decision the specific code articles mentioned in the original text are not provided
